about_the_game:
Explore a defined mystical world where magic can be harnessed in the form of Runes. Start as an adventuring knight, and build your skills to become a powerful sorcerer. Go on Questlines that are catered to the skills you choose to advance. Use the runes you gather to aid you in combat, crafting , and survival!

Explore

IGKnight will offer a mostly open world environment where you can go pretty much anywhere you see, some areas will be locked behind questlines you must finish before the ability to enter.

Advance Your Skills

There will be a list of skills to progress! Skills like, Mining, Combat, Magic, Logging, Smelting, and more. Each milestone in the skill you advance will unlock something new you can do in the game!

Quest Log

The adventurer will be provided with a quest log that will show every quest in the game, if it is not started, in progress or complete. Quests will be themed and focused around your skills. The more of a certain questline will unlock when you reach certain requirements.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 2.6 GHz Quad Core or similar
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 950 or Radeon HD 7970
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10/11
  • Processor: 3GHz Intel I5 or AMD Ryzen 5 Processor
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1060 or Radeon RX 580
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
